verbLexeme: 1. To say yes to something you have been offered or agree to take it. English = accept.
2. To agree to do what someone suggests or advises. English = accept.
3. To get used to a difficult or unpleasant situation and recognise that it cannot be changed. English = accept.
nominalLexeme: 1. The act of agreeing to or taking something you have been offered. English = acceptance.
